wiki.content: According to Songfacts a "Badfish" is a term used to describe a person who exposes someone else to heroin for the first time. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to Songfacts a "Badfish" is a term used to describe a person who exposes someone else to heroin for the first time.

track.name: Badfish
comments: the feels of summer, the taste of coold bear, and the smell of bud, reminds me of good time each summer, surfing the surf and chillin out
I hope this night will never end
Big One! Love that song so much
makes me smile... every time againe :)
LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE this song!!!!

2 Pints of booze, tell me are you a bad fish too? Yes, yes I am so come join me :)

<3 Bradley Nowell
I would beat the shit out of somebody if they tried to get me to do heroin. Or I'd at least say no thanks and excuse myself, you know?
